评论详情: shirts like this seem like they can be sketchy but i bought this for my 4’10 12 yo daughter in size small and it fits her great! it’s pretty comfortable too. the quality and print is good as well, glad it didn’t came bad. would my another print for sure.
I adore this top! It is not true to size though, I would say it runs small. Definitely size up!
Loved the fit and style. Goes with so much.
The print felt like a sticker basically but if you really want the dupe of the urban shirt, this is what you got
However cheap material
The print is just a big dot
For my daughter, fit perfect for a pre-teen!
Horrible fabric and the print is like a plastic sticker on the shirt. Horrible quality, as expected for the cheap price.  Fits small
Super cute baby tee. Very vibrant colors and soft. Doesn’t shrink in the wash thankfully! Definitely a staple for summer

评论概述: What is the brown on this shirt???? It doesn’t show that dark in the description photo! Yikes!

评论详情: runs so small
At first I wasn't sure about this t-shirt until I put it on with tge skirt it look amazing
Love the design. Great colors. Perfect solo or layered.
I wear a black tank under for extra length because I am NOT showing my belly! Really cute under a jean jacket too!

I was so surprised by the quality of this top - it’s thicker than you think! The print is vibrant and it fits really nicely. It’s a shorter cut which I like because I’m short, so it stops above my hips. This size is great because it’s a little more fitted around the chest and arms which I like (if your arms are bigger consider sizing up!). I imagine with some wear this will stretch. I’ve paired this with the shorts from another Amazon set - it basically goes with everything! Big fan!
It came covered in stains and sweat
Fits a little kid and cheap material
Super cute! Not stretchy as a note so that’s purely preference, but I got some many compliments loved this.
fits a bit snug, which it should because its a baby t but I sized up and it's still tight. I would recommend sizing up even if you want it snug, esp if you have a larger chest.

The Women’s Graphic Baby Tee with its vintage Y2K fruit print has quickly become my favorite summer top. Its cute, retro design and cropped fit add a playful, nostalgic vibe to any outfit. Perfectly lightweight for hot days, it pairs great with high-waisted jeans or a skirt for a casual, stylish look.

This is so cute for summer! I’m not a big crop top lover but figured it could be combined with high waisted pieces. I ordered my usual size and it fit well. It was a bit fitted rather than loose like I assumed. It was a bit tight around my chest so if you have a larger bust I would probably recommend sizing up. The length isn’t too short. I ended up spraying it with water and stretching it a bit to make it a little looser. The design on it is super cute too. It’s printed onto the shirt too so when stretched it doesn’t get all cracked and weird. Overall really cute!

I’m usually pretty suspicious about Amazon clothing purchases, especially tees like this, expecting them to feel cheap and thin. I was pleasantly surprised by how nice this was! I can wear it with a black bra and it’s only slightly visible in the back, and not at all in the front. The material is stretchy and lightweight but not cheap. It fits true to size in my opinion. Very cute and comfy!
Beige part is actually dark brown so you can’t see the blue writing. Looks awful in person. Do not buy

This Italy inspired graphic baby t is absolutely adorable. It is the perfect style for this summer’s trend. The cotton is soft and it fits more on the smaller side. I ordered a large to have additional length in the torso due to having a larger chest. It fit me great, but I could have sized up one and had a better fit. The overall quality is very nice, the shirt is exactly as pictured.
Oh so cute, aesthetically pleasing. Fits perfectly. Decent quality, stretchy fabric
Overall this is a very cute cotton crop tee.  The graphic is pretty.  I did have to return it as the sizing seems in the small side,  The baby crop tee just isn’t a good look for me.

Very cute graphic T-shirt top that has a vintage 90s look to it. It is a crop top so it's meant to be on the shorter side and it is somewhat form-fitting. I ordered the largest size possible and it is quite small. It does have a lot of stretch to it though and is not binding. The graphics are very pretty and colorful. I like how light weight and breathable it is perfect for the hotter weather.

I ordered this shirt in a size large, hoping that it would be less cropped and cover my tummy a little more. It doesn’t. It is a cute shirt but sizing up doesn’t help the length, unfortunately. I will probably end up giving this shirt to my daughter who is a more of an age to wear cropped shirts. It has a lot of stretch to it, the print is clear. The print is not a thick plastic patch, it is in the fabric, which is nice. I would recommend this shirt, but know that it doesn’t cover the tummy.

I am normally a medium in shirts and got a large but the shirt was still too cropped…I do have a D chest but it barely made it past them and the shirt is 95% cotton so it would shrink even more. Had to return :(

I absolutely adore this shirt! The print is so cute and has a euro vibe. The fit is flattering and form fitting, it really compliments my figure. The material is thick enough to not be see through, and it’s super soft. I really like this shirt, it’s perfect for summer!
Beautiful fabric and graphic

评论概述: standard cropped tee, colours not as vibrant as pictured
评论详情: cute, simple cropped tee. The material is that of an average stretchy t-shirt, the print is clear, but unfortunately the colours are more grey than in the product photos. Everything is a grey-ish blue, grey-ish green, and a light pink instead of baby blue, bright green, and orange. The fit is standard, a little tighter and more cropped than pictured, but like a typical baby tee. I am a size US 4-6 and ordered the small. A little disappointed with the colours, but still wearable.
Cute
I’m impressed with this top. Good fit and looks nice. Quality was on par with the price - fair. The image printed looks nice as well, although the writing it questionable but oh well.
